metadata.name: Vboot 01
metadata.description:
The project proposes to be a visual essay, learning, and reconnection between the code, processing, and me. It consists of creating sketches in which the images are mixed to generate pictorial abstractions.  
The aesthetics that I maintain, especially in the first sketches, refer to those pictorial experiments carried out by artists and programmers during the first years of the net. art through Web 1.0, consoles, and printers. A kind of tribute to those pioneers and their ideals of decentralization and creative freedom.  
The original pieces are generative. The token is a video capture of the generative piece, each variation is different.

Vboot 01 has been a finalist for the 37º edition prizes of the BMW painting contest. 
It´s also part of the #NFTNYC2023 Generative Art Gallery and shows at the rooftop Artist Village - level 4 Pavilion, North Javits.
